remarks.format: ## Remarks 如前所述，這個類別的成員的行為完全所述但， ，和文件。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **可凍結的功能：** 因為它繼承自類別類別提供數個特殊功能：可以宣告物件，因為在多個物件，變成唯讀，以改善之間共用效能，複製，而且變成具備執行緒安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread safe. 如需有關所提供的不同功能物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## XAML 隱含集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreGeneralTransform3DObjectElements**oneOrMoreGeneralTransform3DObjectElements* 一或多個宣告使用物件項目語法的物件。One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （它們可能不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
